meanings.definition: A document serving as evidence or as a guarantee of authenticity or authority.
meanings.sent1: She proudly displayed her certificates on the wall.
meanings.sent2: The certificates of authenticity were carefully stored in a safe.
meanings.sent3: The certificates seemed to have a secret power, making everyone trust her instantly.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a certificate, assuring everyone of her kindness.
meanings.sent5: The certificates gleamed in the sunlight, shining with importance.

meanings.definition: A document attesting to the completion of a course of study or the passing of an examination.
meanings.sent1: He framed his certificates and hung them in his office.
meanings.sent2: The school awarded her certificates for her outstanding performance.
meanings.sent3: The certificates were like trophies, celebrating their hard work.
meanings.sent4: Her certificates were keys that unlocked new opportunities.
meanings.sent5: The certificates were like medals, proudly displayed for all to see.

meanings.sent1: The organization certificates all employees after training.
meanings.sent2: She certificates each completed project with a stamp of approval.
meanings.sent3: He certificates every achievement, no matter how small.
meanings.sent4: Certificating their skills opens doors to new possibilities.
meanings.sent5: She certificates their efforts, recognizing their hard work.
